definition: objection/differing opinion
two/2/(Beijing dialect) stupid
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
old variant of 話|话[hua4]
not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
see 二話不說|二话不说[er4 hua4 bu4 shuo1]

sentences.english: Without further ado, he took out his pen and lent it to me.
sentences.chinese: 他二话没说，拿出笔来，把它借给了我。

sentences.english: Without saying a word, the militiamen shot and killed him.
sentences.chinese: 民兵们二话不说，开枪把他打死了。

sentences.english: Two guys two words don't say of pull me to go toward to drill in forest.
sentences.chinese: 两个家伙二话不说的拉着我就往森林里钻。

sentences.english: He took a quick look and without another word jumped into the icy water.
sentences.chinese: 他匆忙看了一眼，二话没说，就跳进冰冷刺骨的水里。

sentences.english: But the police just came through the gate and did this.
sentences.chinese: 但那时那些警察就是二话不说冲进来，翻箱倒柜。

sentences.english: Suddenly, without another word, he unlocked my cell and silently led me out.
sentences.chinese: 突然，他二话不说地打开牢门，安静地领着我向外走。

sentences.english: Without a word, the demons did exactly as the king had asked.
sentences.chinese: 两个魔鬼二话不说就照大仁慈王的要求去做了。

sentences.english: The lawyer, without a word, wrote the butcher a check for $9.80.
sentences.chinese: 律师二话不说，给屠夫写了张9块8的支票。

sentences.english: Without a word , the young man rode back quickly to his home.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人二话没说就跑回了家。

sentences.english: Coach a laugh, and the word, you pull me up.
sentences.chinese: 教练一笑，二话不说，就把我拉了起来。

sentences.english: Without a word, the larger gangster followed.
sentences.chinese: 那个大块头二话没说，跟着走了过去。

sentences.english: He left the room without saying anything.
sentences.chinese: 他二话没说离开了房间。

sentences.english: I went to a freak show and they let me in for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我去看一场怪诞秀，他们二话不说就让我进去了。

sentences.english: When they saw me they didn't say anything, then when they came near to me they started to beat me.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到我之后二话不说就开始走近我打我。

sentences.english: She resigned from to the manager without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 她二话没说，立刻向经理辞了职。

definition: not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
see 二話不說|二话不说[er4 hua4 bu4 shuo1]
to readily consent
to turn on one's heels/to walk away abruptly
to agree (to do sth)/to promise
to decline (an appointment, invitation etc)
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: to act tactfully/tactful/discreet
to follow the rules/to do as instructed/to play by the book/to comply with a request
ten thousand deaths will not prevent me (idiom); ready to risk life and limb to help out
solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
to do as promised/to be as good as one's word/to honor one's word/to mean what one says
lit. to chop the nail and slice the iron (idiom)/fig. resolute and decisive/unhesitating/categorical
not to refuse to (idiom)/not to hesitate to
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: to vouch for
